body_html:
The command sudo apt-get upgrade bazel had issues, so did below steps.

  1. cleaned-up all the bazel related files in my machine as per bazelbuild/bazel#838
  2. did fresh installation of bazel v4.4 with "Install with Installer" option as per https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html.

Now the ./configure runs fine, thanks
body_text:

cleaned-up all the bazel related files in my machine as per bazelbuild/bazel#838
did fresh installation of bazel v4.4 with "Install with Installer" option as per https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html.

Now the ./configure runs fine, thanks
body:
The command sudo apt-get upgrade bazel had issues, so did below steps.

1. cleaned-up all the bazel related files in my machine as per https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/838
2. did fresh installation of bazel v4.4 with "Install with Installer" option as per https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/install.html.

Now the ./configure runs fine, thanks
